definition: to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish

sentences.english: Strike was over, but problem existed stilly .
sentences.chinese: 罷工雖然解決了，但問題依然存在。

sentences.english: The people working here tonight have no beef with the picket line .
sentences.chinese: 今晚在這裏上工的人與遊行罷工的人並無芥蒂。

sentences.english: Communication with France was difficult during the telephone and postal strike.
sentences.chinese: 電信與郵政部門罷工期間，與法國通訊聯繫很困難。

sentences.english: Management are seeking a show-down with the unions on the issue of illegal strikes.
sentences.chinese: 資方正在就非法罷工問題與工會攤牌。

sentences.english: The poor boy was named during a streetcar strike in New Orleans in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 窮小子在1929年新奧爾良公車罷工期間得名。

sentences.english: Italy's metal-workers' union calls goes on strike.
sentences.chinese: 意大利鋼鐵工人聯盟發起罷工。

sentences.english: Militant mineworkers in the Ukraine have voted for a one-day stoppage next month.
sentences.chinese: 烏克蘭激進的礦工們已經投票決定下個月罷工一天。

sentences.english: The occupiers immediately froze wages and made strikes illegal .
sentences.chinese: 佔領軍立即宣佈凍結工資並規定罷工爲非法。

sentences.english: In 1981, a seven - week - old Major League Baseball strike ended.
sentences.chinese: 1981年，美國職業棒球長達七週大聯盟罷工結束。

sentences.english: Mitsumi has refused to provide details of the strikers' list of demands.
sentences.chinese: 三美一直拒絕提供有關罷工者所要求的細節。

sentences.english: All these circumstances looked to a great strike.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些情況可能會導致一場大罷工。

sentences.english: At the same time, the conflict between the employers and workers led to the strike.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，勞資雙方的衝突也引起了一場罷工。

sentences.english: The strikers and the employers have reached a settlement over new working conditions.
sentences.chinese: 罷工者已經與顧主就新的工作條件達成了協議。

sentences.english: Communication with other countries was difficult during telephone and postal strike.
sentences.chinese: 在郵電工人罷工期間與其它國家的通訊很困難。

sentences.english: The coalminers decided to go on strike for better working conditions.
sentences.chinese: 煤礦工許多人決定爲爭取更好的工作條件舉行罷工。

sentences.english: The other problem had been his response to a decision by the Kandahar-based vaccination teams to go on strike.
sentences.chinese: 另一問題是他對坎大哈種痘隊罷工決定的反應。

definition: to hold a meeting/to attend a meeting
to leave a place where some event is taking place/(of an actor) to exit/(sports) to leave the field/(of an audience) to leave
to resist/to make a stand and fight (against)
to utilize/to put sth to use
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
to cut staff/to lay off employees
